abstract: Soccer Roundup; United States men's national soccer coach Jurgen Klinsmann adds midfielders Christian Pulisic and Graham Zusi to roster for World Cup qualifier against Guatemala; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Midfielders Christian Pulisic and Graham Zusi joined the roster before Tuesday’s match against Guatemala. The injured Fabian Johnson and Matt Besler were returned to their club teams.

headline.main: U.S. Men’s Soccer Team Adds Two Players Before World Cup Qualifier
headline.print_headline: U.S., Shuffling Its Roster, Adds a Young Midfielder

snippet: Midfielders Christian Pulisic and Graham Zusi joined the roster before Tuesday’s match against Guatemala. The injured Fabian Johnson and Matt Besler were returned to their club teams.
